dimension: 80 1/2 x 1 5/16 in. (204.47 x 3.33 cm) (without tassels and fringe)
title: Headband (Cinta)
description: tapestry woven with wrapped ends; overdyed; dark purple, maroon, pink, dark orange; band has birds, rabbits and geometric designs; thick, three-colored pompons with twisted and loose fringe at ends
